item.title: How to get off a long flight feeling your best
item.description: Here are wellness expert Bryony Deery's 7 top travel tips for beating jet lag and feeling refreshed when leading a jet-setting life.

item.title: A founder who sold her PR firm for $75 million is launching a fertility startup that will send someone to your home to do your injections for $5,000
item.description: Lushi raised $5 million for a service that guides women through fertility treatments.

item.title: Goldman Sachs CFO says it’s a top priority to retain the ‘most talented people’
item.description: Denis Coleman discusses the competitive environment for talent.

item.title: Boeing is building its troubled new 737 Max planes for the first time since workers went on strike in September
item.description: Plane-building resumed at its plant after going through a process of training workers and identifying and fixing potential problems.

item.title: Rethinking office space with neurodiverse workers in mind
item.description: Employers are showing more interest in office design elements like quiet spaces and softer lighting.
